info.author: Liang Zhang lzhang13@memphis.edu
info.abstract: CopyCovariate performs a features addition process over a tab-delimited datafile. This component can effectively add new produced features into the previous datafile
info.details: This compoment can pass new feature (CF..Corvariate.) to the previous datafile following each Anon Student Id automatically. So the output datafile is added with one more column (new feature). Email the author directly with bug reports for this component.

inputs.b: A file with specific Name and CF..Corvariate..

outputs.b: A Tab-delimited file with added new feature

info.options:
OldCol: CF..Corvariate.
NewCol: CF (Posttest) - You may name the added feature column as you want
KeyCol: Anon.Student.Id
AddCol: Name - Other name like Anon.Student.Id can also be used.
